response:
Severe left visual loss with left RAPD localises to the left optic nerve. Spastic left-leg-predominant weakness with clonus, Babinski, and impaired proprioception/Romberg with arm sparing localises best to a left hemicord lesion below T1, affecting corticospinal and dorsal column pathways.

lesion_locations = ["left optic nerve", "left thoracic spinal cord"]
